00101 /* Mesh -> BMesh */
00102 void BM_mesh_bm_from_me(BMesh *bm, Mesh *me, int set_key, int act_key_nr)
00103 {
00104     MVert *mvert;
00105     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00106     MEdge *medge;
00107     MLoop *ml;
00108     MPoly *mpoly;
00109     KeyBlock *actkey, *block;
00110     BMVert *v, **vt = NULL, **verts = NULL;
00111     BMEdge *e, **fedges = NULL, **et = NULL;
00112     BMFace *f;
00113     BMLoop *l;
00114     BLI_array_declare(fedges);
00115     float (*keyco)[3] = NULL;
00116     int *keyi;
00117     int totuv, i, j;
00118 
00119     /* free custom data */
00120     /* this isnt needed in most cases but do just incase */
00121     CustomData_free(&bm->vdata, bm->totvert);
00122     CustomData_free(&bm->edata, bm->totedge);
00123     CustomData_free(&bm->ldata, bm->totloop);
00124     CustomData_free(&bm->pdata, bm->totface);
00125 
00126     if (!me || !me->totvert) {
00127         if (me) { /*no verts? still copy customdata layout*/
00128             CustomData_copy(&me->vdata, &bm->vdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_ASSIGN, 0);
00129             CustomData_copy(&me->edata, &bm->edata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_ASSIGN, 0);
00130             CustomData_copy(&me->ldata, &bm->ldata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_ASSIGN, 0);
00131             CustomData_copy(&me->pdata, &bm->pdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_ASSIGN, 0);
00132 
00133             CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->vdata, me->totvert, BM_VERT);
00134             CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->edata, me->totedge, BM_EDGE);
00135             CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->ldata, me->totloop, BM_LOOP);
00136             CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->pdata, me->totpoly, BM_FACE);
00137         }
00138         return; /* sanity check */
00139     }
00140 
00141     vt = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void **) * me->totvert, "mesh to bmesh vtable");
00142 
00143     CustomData_copy(&me->vdata, &bm->vdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00144     CustomData_copy(&me->edata, &bm->edata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00145     CustomData_copy(&me->ldata, &bm->ldata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00146     CustomData_copy(&me->pdata, &bm->pdata, CD_MASK_BMESH, CD_CALLOC, 0);
00147 
00148     /* make sure uv layer names are consisten */
00149     totuv = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00150     for (i = 0; i < totuv; i++) {
00151         int li = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY, i);
00152         CustomData_set_layer_name(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV, i, bm->pdata.layers[li].name);
00153     }
00154 
00155     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_CREASE))
00156         CustomData_add_layer(&bm->edata, CD_CREASE, CD_ASSIGN, NULL, 0);
00157 
00158     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT))
00159         CustomData_add_layer(&bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT, CD_ASSIGN, NULL, 0);
00160 
00161     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT))
00162         CustomData_add_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT, CD_ASSIGN, NULL, 0);
00163 
00164     if ((act_key_nr != 0) && (me->key != NULL)) {
00165         actkey = BLI_findlink(&me->key->block, act_key_nr - 1);
00166     }
00167     else {
00168         actkey = NULL;
00169     }
00170 
00171     if (me->key) {
00172         CustomData_add_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX, CD_ASSIGN, NULL, 0);
00173 
00174         /* check if we need to generate unique ids for the shapekeys.
00175          * this also exists in the file reading code, but is here for
00176          * a sanity check */
00177         if (!me->key->uidgen) {
00178             fprintf(stderr,
00179                     "%s had to generate shape key uid's in a situation we shouldn't need to! "
00180                     "(bmesh internal error)\n",
00181                     __func__);
00182 
00183             me->key->uidgen = 1;
00184             for (block = me->key->block.first; block; block = block->next) {
00185                 block->uid = me->key->uidgen++;
00186             }
00187         }
00188 
00189         if (actkey && actkey->totelem == me->totvert) {
00190             keyco = actkey->data;
00191             bm->shapenr = act_key_nr;
00192         }
00193 
00194         for (i = 0, block = me->key->block.first; block; block = block->next, i++) {
00195             CustomData_add_layer_named(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY,
00196                                        CD_ASSIGN, NULL, 0, block->name);
00197 
00198             j = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY, i);
00199             bm->vdata.layers[j].uid = block->uid;
00200         }
00201     }
00202 
00203     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->vdata, me->totvert, BM_VERT);
00204     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->edata, me->totedge, BM_EDGE);
00205     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->ldata, me->totloop, BM_LOOP);
00206     CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(&bm->pdata, me->totpoly, BM_FACE);
00207 
00208     for (i = 0, mvert = me->mvert; i < me->totvert; i++, mvert++) {
00209         v = BM_vert_create(bm, keyco && set_key ? keyco[i] : mvert->co, NULL);
00210         BM_elem_index_set(v, i); /* set_ok */
00211         vt[i] = v;
00212 
00213         /* transfer flag */
00214         v->head.hflag = BM_vert_flag_from_mflag(mvert->flag & ~SELECT);
00215 
00216         /* this is necessary for selection counts to work properly */
00217         if (mvert->flag & SELECT) {
00218             BM_vert_select_set(bm, v, TRUE);
00219         }
00220 
00221         normal_short_to_float_v3(v->no, mvert->no);
00222 
00223         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->vdata, v, CD_BWEIGHT, (float)mvert->bweight / 255.0f);
00224 
00225         /* Copy Custom Dat */
00226         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&me->vdata, &bm->vdata, i, &v->head.data);
00227 
00228         /* set shapekey data */
00229         if (me->key) {
00230             /* set shape key original index */
00231             keyi = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX);
00232             if (keyi) {
00233                 *keyi = i;
00234             }
00235 
00236             for (block = me->key->block.first, j = 0; block; block = block->next, j++) {
00237                 float *co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, j);
00238 
00239                 if (co) {
00240                     copy_v3_v3(co, ((float *)block->data) + 3 * i);
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244     }
00245 
00246     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT; /* added in order, clear dirty flag */
00247 
00248     if (!me->totedge) {
00249         MEM_freeN(vt);
00250         return;
00251     }
00252 
00253     et = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void **) * me->totedge, "mesh to bmesh etable");
00254 
00255     medge = me->medge;
00256     for (i = 0; i < me->totedge; i++, medge++) {
00257         e = BM_edge_create(bm, vt[medge->v1], vt[medge->v2], NULL, FALSE);
00258         BM_elem_index_set(e, i); /* set_ok */
00259         et[i] = e;
00260 
00261         /* transfer flags */
00262         e->head.hflag = BM_edge_flag_from_mflag(medge->flag & ~SELECT);
00263 
00264         /* this is necessary for selection counts to work properly */
00265         if (medge->flag & SELECT) {
00266             BM_edge_select_set(bm, e, TRUE);
00267         }
00268 
00269         /* Copy Custom Data */
00270         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&me->edata, &bm->edata, i, &e->head.data);
00271 
00272         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->edata, e, CD_CREASE, (float)medge->crease / 255.0f);
00273         BM_elem_float_data_set(&bm->edata, e, CD_BWEIGHT, (float)medge->bweight / 255.0f);
00274     }
00275 
00276     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE; /* added in order, clear dirty flag */
00277 
00278     mpoly = me->mpoly;
00279     for (i = 0; i < me->totpoly; i++, mpoly++) {
00280         BMIter iter;
00281 
00282         BLI_array_empty(fedges);
00283         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00284 
00285         BLI_array_growitems(fedges, mpoly->totloop);
00286         BLI_array_growitems(verts, mpoly->totloop);
00287 
00288         for (j = 0; j < mpoly->totloop; j++) {
00289             ml = &me->mloop[mpoly->loopstart + j];
00290             v = vt[ml->v];
00291             e = et[ml->e];
00292 
00293             fedges[j] = e;
00294             verts[j] = v;
00295         }
00296 
00297         /* not sure what this block is supposed to do,
00298          * but its unused. so commenting - campbell */
00299 #if 0
00300         {
00301             BMVert *v1, *v2;
00302             v1 = vt[me->mloop[mpoly->loopstart].v];
00303             v2 = vt[me->mloop[mpoly->loopstart + 1].v];
00304 
00305             if (v1 == fedges[0]->v1) {
00306                 v2 = fedges[0]->v2;
00307             }
00308             else {
00309                 v1 = fedges[0]->v2;
00310                 v2 = fedges[0]->v1;
00311             }
00312         }
00313 #endif
00314 
00315         f = BM_face_create(bm, verts, fedges, mpoly->totloop, FALSE);
00316 
00317         if (!f) {
00318             printf("%s: Warning! Bad face in mesh"
00319                    " \"%s\" at index %d!, skipping\n",
00320                    __func__, me->id.name + 2, i);
00321             continue;
00322         }
00323 
00324         /* don't use 'i' since we may have skipped the face */
00325         BM_elem_index_set(f, bm->totface - 1); /* set_ok */
00326 
00327         /* transfer flag */
00328         f->head.hflag = BM_face_flag_from_mflag(mpoly->flag & ~ME_FACE_SEL);
00329 
00330         /* this is necessary for selection counts to work properly */
00331         if (mpoly->flag & ME_FACE_SEL) {
00332             BM_face_select_set(bm, f, TRUE);
00333         }
00334 
00335         f->mat_nr = mpoly->mat_nr;
00336         if (i == me->act_face) bm->act_face = f;
00337 
00338         j = 0;
00339         BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &iter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, j) {
00340             /* Save index of correspsonding MLoop */
00341             BM_elem_index_set(l, mpoly->loopstart + j); /* set_loop */
00342         }
00343 
00344         /* Copy Custom Data */
00345         CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&me->pdata, &bm->pdata, i, &f->head.data);
00346     }
00347 
00348     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_FACE; /* added in order, clear dirty flag */
00349 
00350     {
00351         BMIter fiter;
00352         BMIter liter;
00353 
00354         /* Copy over loop CustomData. Doing this in a separate loop isn't necessary
00355          * but is an optimization, to avoid copying a bunch of interpolated customdata
00356          * for each BMLoop (from previous BMLoops using the same edge), always followed
00357          * by freeing the interpolated data and overwriting it with data from the Mesh. */
00358         BM_ITER_MESH (f, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00359             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00360                 int li = BM_elem_index_get(l);
00361                 CustomData_to_bmesh_block(&me->ldata, &bm->ldata, li, &l->head.data);
00362                 BM_elem_index_set(l, 0); /* set_loop */
00363             }
00364         }
00365     }
00366 
00367     if (me->mselect && me->totselect != 0) {
00368 
00369         BMVert **vert_array = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMVert *) * bm->totvert,
00370                                           "Selection Conversion Vertex Pointer Array");
00371         BMEdge **edge_array = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMEdge *) * bm->totedge,
00372                                           "Selection Conversion Edge Pointer Array");
00373         BMFace **face_array = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMFace *) * bm->totface,
00374                                           "Selection Conversion Face Pointer Array");
00375 
00376         BMIter  iter;
00377         BMVert  *vert;
00378         BMEdge  *edge;
00379         BMFace  *face;
00380         MSelect *msel;
00381 
00382         BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (vert, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) { vert_array[i] = vert; }
00383         BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (edge, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) { edge_array[i] = edge; }
00384         BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (face, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, i) { face_array[i] = face; }
00385 
00386         for (i = 0, msel = me->mselect; i < me->totselect; i++, msel++) {
00387             switch (msel->type) {
00388                 case ME_VSEL:
00389                     BM_select_history_store(bm, (BMElem *)vert_array[msel->index]);
00390                     break;
00391                 case ME_ESEL:
00392                     BM_select_history_store(bm, (BMElem *)edge_array[msel->index]);
00393                     break;
00394                 case ME_FSEL:
00395                     BM_select_history_store(bm, (BMElem *)face_array[msel->index]);
00396                     break;
00397             }
00398         }
00399 
00400         MEM_freeN(vert_array);
00401         MEM_freeN(edge_array);
00402         MEM_freeN(face_array);
00403     }
00404     else {
00405         me->totselect = 0;
00406         if (me->mselect) {
00407             MEM_freeN(me->mselect);
00408             me->mselect = NULL;
00409         }
00410     }
00411 
00412     BLI_array_free(fedges);
00413     BLI_array_free(verts);
00414 
00415     MEM_freeN(vt);
00416     MEM_freeN(et);
00417 }
00418 
00419 
00420 /* BMesh -> Mesh */
00421 static BMVert **bm_to_mesh_vertex_map(BMesh *bm, int ototvert)
00422 {
00423     BMVert **vertMap = NULL;
00424     BMVert *eve;
00425     int index;
00426     int i = 0;
00427     BMIter iter;
00428 
00429     /* caller needs to ensure this */
00430     BLI_assert(ototvert > 0);
00431 
00432     vertMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vertMap) * ototvert, "vertMap");
00433     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX)) {
00434         int *keyi;
00435         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00436             keyi = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX);
00437             if (keyi) {
00438                 if (((index = *keyi) != ORIGINDEX_NONE) && (index < ototvert)) {
00439                     vertMap[index] = eve;
00440                 }
00441             }
00442             else {
00443                 if (i < ototvert) {
00444                     vertMap[i] = eve;
00445                 }
00446             }
00447             i++;
00448         }
00449     }
00450     else {
00451         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00452             if (i < ototvert) {
00453                 vertMap[i] = eve;
00454             }
00455             else {
00456                 break;
00457             }
00458             i++;
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462     return vertMap;
00463 }
00464 
00468 static int bm_to_mesh_shape_layer_index_from_kb(BMesh *bm, KeyBlock *currkey)
00469 {
00470     int i;
00471     int j = 0;
00472 
00473     for (i = 0; i < bm->vdata.totlayer; i++) {
00474         if (bm->vdata.layers[i].type == CD_SHAPEKEY) {
00475             if (currkey->uid == bm->vdata.layers[i].uid) {
00476                 return j;
00477             }
00478             j++;
00479         }
00480     }
00481     return -1;
00482 }
00483 
00484 BLI_INLINE void bmesh_quick_edgedraw_flag(MEdge *med, BMEdge *e)
00485 {
00486     /* this is a cheap way to set the edge draw, its not precise and will
00487      * pick the first 2 faces an edge uses.
00488      * The dot comparison is a little arbitrary, but set so that a 5 subd
00489      * IcoSphere won't vanish but subd 6 will (as with pre-bmesh blender) */
00490 
00491 
00492     if ( /* (med->flag & ME_EDGEDRAW) && */ /* assume to be true */
00493          (e->l && (e->l != e->l->radial_next)) &&
00494          (dot_v3v3(e->l->f->no, e->l->radial_next->f->no) > 0.9995f))
00495     {
00496         med->flag &= ~ME_EDGEDRAW;
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00500 void BM_mesh_bm_to_me(BMesh *bm, Mesh *me, int dotess)
00501 {
00502     MLoop *mloop;
00503     MPoly *mpoly;
00504     MVert *mvert, *oldverts;
00505     MEdge *med, *medge;
00506     BMVert *v, *eve;
00507     BMEdge *e;
00508     BMLoop *l;
00509     BMFace *f;
00510     BMIter iter, liter;
00511     int i, j, ototvert;
00512 
00513     ototvert = me->totvert;
00514 
00515     /* new vertex block */
00516     if (bm->totvert == 0) mvert = NULL;
00517     else mvert = MEM_callocN(bm->totvert * sizeof(MVert), "loadeditbMesh vert");
00518 
00519     /* new edge block */
00520     if (bm->totedge == 0) medge = NULL;
00521     else medge = MEM_callocN(bm->totedge * sizeof(MEdge), "loadeditbMesh edge");
00522 
00523     /* new ngon face block */
00524     if (bm->totface == 0) mpoly = NULL;
00525     else mpoly = MEM_callocN(bm->totface * sizeof(MPoly), "loadeditbMesh poly");
00526 
00527     /* new loop block */
00528     if (bm->totloop == 0) mloop = NULL;
00529     else mloop = MEM_callocN(bm->totloop * sizeof(MLoop), "loadeditbMesh loop");
00530 
00531     /* lets save the old verts just in case we are actually working on
00532      * a key ... we now do processing of the keys at the end */
00533     oldverts = me->mvert;
00534 
00535     /* don't free this yet */
00536     CustomData_set_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT, NULL);
00537 
00538     /* free custom data */
00539     CustomData_free(&me->vdata, me->totvert);
00540     CustomData_free(&me->edata, me->totedge);
00541     CustomData_free(&me->fdata, me->totface);
00542     CustomData_free(&me->ldata, me->totloop);
00543     CustomData_free(&me->pdata, me->totpoly);
00544 
00545     /* add new custom data */
00546     me->totvert = bm->totvert;
00547     me->totedge = bm->totedge;
00548     me->totloop = bm->totloop;
00549     me->totpoly = bm->totface;
00550     /* will be overwritten with a valid value if 'dotess' is set, otherwise we
00551      * end up with 'me->totface' and me->mface == NULL which can crash [#28625]
00552      */
00553     me->totface = 0;
00554 
00555     CustomData_copy(&bm->vdata, &me->vdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_CALLOC, me->totvert);
00556     CustomData_copy(&bm->edata, &me->edata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_CALLOC, me->totedge);
00557     CustomData_copy(&bm->ldata, &me->ldata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_CALLOC, me->totloop);
00558     CustomData_copy(&bm->pdata, &me->pdata, CD_MASK_MESH, CD_CALLOC, me->totpoly);
00559 
00560     CustomData_add_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT, CD_ASSIGN, mvert, me->totvert);
00561     CustomData_add_layer(&me->edata, CD_MEDGE, CD_ASSIGN, medge, me->totedge);
00562     CustomData_add_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MLOOP, CD_ASSIGN, mloop, me->totloop);
00563     CustomData_add_layer(&me->pdata, CD_MPOLY, CD_ASSIGN, mpoly, me->totpoly);
00564 
00565     /* this is called again, 'dotess' arg is used there */
00566     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, 0);
00567 
00568     i = 0;
00569     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00570         float *bweight = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00571 
00572         mvert->bweight = bweight ? (char)((*bweight) * 255) : 0;
00573 
00574         copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, v->co);
00575         normal_float_to_short_v3(mvert->no, v->no);
00576 
00577         mvert->flag = BM_vert_flag_to_mflag(v);
00578 
00579         BM_elem_index_set(v, i); /* set_inline */
00580 
00581         /* copy over customdat */
00582         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->vdata, &me->vdata, v->head.data, i);
00583 
00584         i++;
00585         mvert++;
00586 
00587         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v);
00588     }
00589     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT;
00590 
00591     med = medge;
00592     i = 0;
00593     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00594         float *crease = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, e->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00595         float *bweight = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, e->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00596 
00597         med->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(e->v1);
00598         med->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(e->v2);
00599         med->crease = crease ? (char)((*crease) * 255) : 0;
00600         med->bweight = bweight ? (char)((*bweight) * 255) : 0;
00601 
00602         med->flag = BM_edge_flag_to_mflag(e);
00603 
00604         BM_elem_index_set(e, i); /* set_inline */
00605 
00606         /* copy over customdata */
00607         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->edata, &me->edata, e->head.data, i);
00608 
00609         bmesh_quick_edgedraw_flag(med, e);
00610 
00611         i++;
00612         med++;
00613         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
00614     }
00615     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
00616 
00617     i = 0;
00618     j = 0;
00619     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00620         mpoly->loopstart = j;
00621         mpoly->totloop = f->len;
00622         mpoly->mat_nr = f->mat_nr;
00623         mpoly->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(f);
00624 
00625         l = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, f);
00626         for ( ; l; l = BM_iter_step(&liter), j++, mloop++) {
00627             mloop->e = BM_elem_index_get(l->e);
00628             mloop->v = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
00629 
00630             /* copy over customdat */
00631             CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->ldata, &me->ldata, l->head.data, j);
00632             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l);
00633             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->e);
00634             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->v);
00635         }
00636 
00637         if (f == bm->act_face) me->act_face = i;
00638 
00639         /* copy over customdata */
00640         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->pdata, &me->pdata, f->head.data, i);
00641 
00642         i++;
00643         mpoly++;
00644         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f);
00645     }
00646 
00647     /* patch hook indices and vertex parents */
00648     if (ototvert > 0) {
00649         Object *ob;
00650         ModifierData *md;
00651         BMVert **vertMap = NULL;
00652         int i, j;
00653 
00654         for (ob = G.main->object.first; ob; ob = ob->id.next) {
00655             if ((ob->parent) && (ob->parent->data == me) && ELEM(ob->partype, PARVERT1, PARVERT3)) {
00656 
00657                 if (vertMap == NULL) {
00658                     vertMap = bm_to_mesh_vertex_map(bm, ototvert);
00659                 }
00660 
00661                 if (ob->par1 < ototvert) {
00662                     eve = vertMap[ob->par1];
00663                     if (eve) ob->par1 = BM_elem_index_get(eve);
00664                 }
00665                 if (ob->par2 < ototvert) {
00666                     eve = vertMap[ob->par2];
00667                     if (eve) ob->par2 = BM_elem_index_get(eve);
00668                 }
00669                 if (ob->par3 < ototvert) {
00670                     eve = vertMap[ob->par3];
00671                     if (eve) ob->par3 = BM_elem_index_get(eve);
00672                 }
00673 
00674             }
00675             if (ob->data == me) {
00676                 for (md = ob->modifiers.first; md; md = md->next) {
00677                     if (md->type == eModifierType_Hook) {
00678                         HookModifierData *hmd = (HookModifierData *) md;
00679 
00680                         if (vertMap == NULL) {
00681                             vertMap = bm_to_mesh_vertex_map(bm, ototvert);
00682                         }
00683 
00684                         for (i = j = 0; i < hmd->totindex; i++) {
00685                             if (hmd->indexar[i] < ototvert) {
00686                                 eve = vertMap[hmd->indexar[i]];
00687 
00688                                 if (eve) {
00689                                     hmd->indexar[j++] = BM_elem_index_get(eve);
00690                                 }
00691                             }
00692                             else j++;
00693                         }
00694 
00695                         hmd->totindex = j;
00696                     }
00697                 }
00698             }
00699         }
00700 
00701         if (vertMap) MEM_freeN(vertMap);
00702     }
00703 
00704     if (dotess) {
00705         BKE_mesh_tessface_calc(me);
00706     }
00707 
00708     mesh_update_customdata_pointers(me, dotess);
00709 
00710     {
00711         BMEditSelection *selected;
00712         me->totselect = BLI_countlist(&(bm->selected));
00713 
00714         if (me->mselect) MEM_freeN(me->mselect);
00715 
00716         me->mselect = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MSelect) * me->totselect, "Mesh selection history");
00717 
00718 
00719         for (i = 0, selected = bm->selected.first; selected; i++, selected = selected->next) {
00720             if (selected->htype == BM_VERT) {
00721                 me->mselect[i].type = ME_VSEL;
00722 
00723             }
00724             else if (selected->htype == BM_EDGE) {
00725                 me->mselect[i].type = ME_ESEL;
00726 
00727             }
00728             else if (selected->htype == BM_FACE) {
00729                 me->mselect[i].type = ME_FSEL;
00730             }
00731 
00732             me->mselect[i].index = BM_elem_index_get(selected->ele);
00733         }
00734     }
00735 
00736     /* see comment below, this logic is in twice */
00737 
00738     if (me->key) {
00739         KeyBlock *currkey;
00740         KeyBlock *actkey = BLI_findlink(&me->key->block, bm->shapenr - 1);
00741 
00742         float (*ofs)[3] = NULL;
00743 
00744         /* go through and find any shapekey customdata layers
00745          * that might not have corresponding KeyBlocks, and add them if
00746          * necessary */
00747         j = 0;
00748         for (i = 0; i < bm->vdata.totlayer; i++) {
00749             if (bm->vdata.layers[i].type != CD_SHAPEKEY)
00750                 continue;
00751 
00752             for (currkey = me->key->block.first; currkey; currkey = currkey->next) {
00753                 if (currkey->uid == bm->vdata.layers[i].uid)
00754                     break;
00755             }
00756 
00757             if (!currkey) {
00758                 currkey = add_keyblock(me->key, bm->vdata.layers[i].name);
00759                 currkey->uid = bm->vdata.layers[i].uid;
00760             }
00761 
00762             j++;
00763         }
00764 
00765 
00766         /* editing the base key should update others */
00767         if ((me->key->type == KEY_RELATIVE) && /* only need offsets for relative shape keys */
00768             (actkey   != NULL) &&              /* unlikely, but the active key may not be valid if the
00769                                                 * bmesh and the mesh are out of sync */
00770             (oldverts != NULL))                /* not used here, but 'oldverts' is used later for applying 'ofs' */
00771         {
00772             int act_is_basis = FALSE;
00773 
00774             /* find if this key is a basis for any others */
00775             for (currkey = me->key->block.first; currkey; currkey = currkey->next) {
00776                 if (bm->shapenr - 1 == currkey->relative) {
00777                     act_is_basis = TRUE;
00778                     break;
00779                 }
00780             }
00781 
00782             if (act_is_basis) { /* active key is a base */
00783                 float (*fp)[3] = actkey->data;
00784                 int *keyi;
00785 
00786                 ofs = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * bm->totvert,  "currkey->data");
00787                 mvert = me->mvert;
00788                 BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
00789                     keyi = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX);
00790                     if (keyi && *keyi != ORIGINDEX_NONE) {
00791                         sub_v3_v3v3(ofs[i], mvert->co, fp[*keyi]);
00792                     }
00793                     mvert++;
00794                 }
00795             }
00796         }
00797 
00798         for (currkey = me->key->block.first; currkey; currkey = currkey->next) {
00799             int apply_offset = (ofs && (currkey != actkey) && (bm->shapenr - 1 == currkey->relative));
00800             int *keyi;
00801             float (*ofs_pt)[3] = ofs;
00802             float *newkey, *oldkey, *fp;
00803 
00804             j = bm_to_mesh_shape_layer_index_from_kb(bm, currkey);
00805 
00806 
00807             fp = newkey = MEM_callocN(me->key->elemsize * bm->totvert,  "currkey->data");
00808             oldkey = currkey->data;
00809 
00810             mvert = me->mvert;
00811             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00812 
00813                 if (currkey == actkey) {
00814                     copy_v3_v3(fp, eve->co);
00815 
00816                     if (actkey != me->key->refkey) { /* important see bug [#30771] */
00817                         if (oldverts) {
00818                             keyi = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX);
00819                             if (*keyi != ORIGINDEX_NONE && *keyi < currkey->totelem) { /* valid old vertex */
00820                                 copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, oldverts[*keyi].co);
00821                             }
00822                         }
00823                     }
00824                 }
00825                 else if (j != -1) {
00826                     /* in most cases this runs */
00827                     copy_v3_v3(fp, CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, j));
00828                 }
00829                 else if (oldkey &&
00830                          (keyi = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_SHAPE_KEYINDEX)) &&
00831                          (*keyi != ORIGINDEX_NONE && *keyi < currkey->totelem))
00832                 {
00833                     /* old method of reconstructing keys via vertice's original key indices,
00834                      * currently used if the new method above fails (which is theoretically
00835                      * possible in certain cases of undo) */
00836                     copy_v3_v3(fp, &oldkey[3 * (*keyi)]);
00837                 }
00838                 else {
00839                     /* fail! fill in with dummy value */
00840                     copy_v3_v3(fp, mvert->co);
00841                 }
00842 
00843                 /* propagate edited basis offsets to other shapes */
00844                 if (apply_offset) {
00845                     add_v3_v3(fp, *ofs_pt++);
00846                 }
00847 
00848                 fp += 3;
00849                 mvert++;
00850             }
00851 
00852             currkey->totelem = bm->totvert;
00853             if (currkey->data) {
00854                 MEM_freeN(currkey->data);
00855             }
00856             currkey->data = newkey;
00857         }
00858 
00859         if (ofs) MEM_freeN(ofs);
00860     }
00861 
00862     if (oldverts) MEM_freeN(oldverts);
00863 
00864     /* topology could be changed, ensure mdisps are ok */
00865     multires_topology_changed(me);
00866 }
